synopsis.text:
Who will emerge victorious from a twisted game of survival in the prestigious Hope's Peak Academy? This elite high school, known for nurturing the best and brightest students, has a dark secret: the only way to graduate is by murdering a fellow classmate without getting caught.

Makoto Naegi, an ordinary student who was accepted into the academy by sheer luck, finds himself trapped in this sinister game, along with 14 other elite students. The school's principal, Monokuma, a robotic teddy bear with a cruel streak, sets the rules: if the killer is caught, they will be executed, but if the other students fail to identify the murderer, they will meet their own demise, and the killer will graduate.

As tension and fear mount among the students, they must decide whether to participate in Monokuma's deadly game or risk spending the rest of their lives trapped in the school. With their lives on the line, the students must use their unique skills and talents to uncover the truth and outwit their classmates in this high-stakes game of deception and survival. Will they be able to solve the mystery and escape, or will they fall victim to the deadly game? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
